title: Is Suvarna Prashana, an ayurvedic immunization for kids, safe to give after 6 months? Does it have metals which can heavily affect the baby?
description: Answer: Yes , It has gold metal in it but safe for your child. suvarnaprashan contains gold metal ash which is easily absorbable in the body of the child and is effective . Very less gold ash is used and it is purified before using by different ayurvedic gold purification methods. So, It doesn't ...
